headline.main: Bernie Sanders Raises $1 Million Off Attack From Allies of Hillary Clinton

docs.snippet: Senator Bernie Sanders has raised more than $1 million in small-dollar contributions off two email solicitations that highlighted an attack from allies of Hillary Rodham Clinton, a campaign official said....
docs.abstract: Senator Bernie Sanders has raised more than $1 million in small-dollar contributions off two email solicitations that highlighted an attack from allies of Hillary Rodham Clinton, a campaign official said.

headline.main: Miami Heat Part-Owner Cannot Suppress Tongue-Wagging Photo
headline.print_headline: Miami Heat Part-Owner Cannot Suppress Tongue-Wagging Photo

docs.snippet: A federal appeals court said a minority owner of the Miami Heat basketball team cannot stop a woman from running a scathingly critical blog featuring an unflattering photo of him with his tongue protruding askew from his mouth....
docs.lead_paragraph: A federal appeals court said a minority owner of the Miami Heat basketball team cannot stop a woman from running a scathingly critical blog featuring an unflattering photo of him with his tongue protruding askew from his mouth.

headline.main: White House Prepares for Pomp, Politics of Pope Francis Visit
headline.print_headline: White House Prepares for Pomp, Politics of Pope Francis Visit

docs.snippet: When Pope Francis arrives in Washington next week, the White House hopes he will bring attention to the need to curb climate change and fight inequality - areas of common ground for the popular pontiff and President Barack Obama....
docs.lead_paragraph: When Pope Francis arrives in Washington next week, the White House hopes he will bring attention to the need to curb climate change and fight inequality - areas of common ground for the popular pontiff and President Barack Obama.

docs.snippet: In a story sent Sept. 17 about a debate exchange on casino gambling between Republican presidential candidates Donald Trump and Jeb Bush, The Associated Press erroneously reported the name of Trump's spokeswoman. Her name is Hope Hicks, not Holly ...
docs.lead_paragraph: In a story sent Sept. 17 about a debate exchange on casino gambling between Republican presidential candidates Donald Trump and Jeb Bush, The Associated Press erroneously reported the name of Trump's spokeswoman. Her name is Hope Hicks, not Holly Hicks.

headline.main: 10 Dead in Land Conflicts Among Nicaragua Settlers, Indians
headline.print_headline: 10 Dead in Land Conflicts Among Nicaragua Settlers, Indians

docs.snippet: Land conflicts between settlers and Miskito Indians on Nicaragua's Atlantic coast have left at least nine people dead this month and 20 wounded....
docs.lead_paragraph: Land conflicts between settlers and Miskito Indians on Nicaragua's Atlantic coast have left at least nine people dead this month and 20 wounded.

headline.main: US Marshals: Ohio Killer Who Left Prison Farm in '72 Is Dead
headline.print_headline: US Marshals: Ohio Killer Who Left Prison Farm in '72 Is Dead

docs.snippet: A man who was convicted of throwing a student nurse to her death from a hospital roof in 1958 later walked away from a prison work farm and lived under an alias for decades, even marrying and earning a college degree, before he died in 2004, autho...
docs.lead_paragraph: A man who was convicted of throwing a student nurse to her death from a hospital roof in 1958 later walked away from a prison work farm and lived under an alias for decades, even marrying and earning a college degree, before he died in 2004, authorities said Thursday.

headline.main: Buffalo Wild Wings Ending Ads After Actor Lied About 9/11
headline.print_headline: Buffalo Wild Wings Ending Ads After Actor Lied About Sept 11

docs.snippet: Buffalo Wild Wings will stop airing commercials featuring the comedian Steve Rannazzisi, who said this week that he lied about being in the World Trade Center during the Sept. 11 attacks....
docs.lead_paragraph: Buffalo Wild Wings will stop airing commercials featuring the comedian Steve Rannazzisi, who said this week that he lied about being in the World Trade Center during the Sept. 11 attacks.

headline.main: Texas Instruments Sets $7.5 Billion Buyback Plan, Raises Dividend
headline.print_headline: Texas Instruments Sets $7.5 Billion Buyback Plan, Raises Dividend

docs.snippet: Chipmaker Texas Instruments Inc said it plans to buy back shares worth up to $7.5 billion as part of a new repurchase program....
docs.lead_paragraph: Chipmaker Texas Instruments Inc said it plans to buy back shares worth up to $7.5 billion as part of a new repurchase program.

headline.main: Pentagon awards medals to Paris train heroes
headline.sub: Pentagon awards medals to Paris train heroes

docs.snippet: The three Americans credited with foiling an attack on a Paris-bound train in August are awarded medals at the Pentagon. Rough Cut (no reporter narration)....
docs.lead_paragraph: The three Americans credited with foiling an attack on a Paris-bound train in August are awarded medals at the Pentagon. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).

headline.main: Hospital Examines Deaths of 2 Patients With Mold Infections
headline.print_headline: Hospital Examines Deaths of 2 Patients With Mold Infections

docs.snippet: A hospital in Pittsburgh is investigating whether the deaths of two patients are linked to infections from mold they may have contracted while in an intensive care unit....
docs.lead_paragraph: A hospital in Pittsburgh is investigating whether the deaths of two patients are linked to infections from mold they may have contracted while in an intensive care unit.
